class sfcnn

Detailed Description

template<typename Point, typename Ptype = typename Point::__NumType>
class sfcnn_work< Point, Ptype >

A space filling curve nearest neighbor class.

This is the workhorse class for the sfcnn class. The Space Filling Curve Nearest Neighbor (SFCNN) algorithm sorts the input data set into 2-order Morton ordering. Nearest neighbors are then calculated based on that curve. The algorithm has a runtime of O(ln(N)), a construction time of O(Nlog(N)), and a space requirement of O(N). The query functions of the algorithm are thread-safe.
